title: btcnope
author: btcnope
content: Currently, Scooby Doo (SODO) - is a meme token based on the Ethereum Blockchain, but we will be announcing much more in the future (unexpected exchange listings, own Dex launch, Blockchain gaming platform launch, and much more). The Doge Season is not over, it is just beginning, and Scooby is once again kicking off the Doge Season.Buy Now on PinkSale: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x31Ac7a1efb60A058d590Cc4d0C4608CC139DCe00?chain=ETHPresale Start Time: 10th MAY 2023 10AM UTCPresale End Time: 10th MAY 2023 10AM UTCUniswap & Dextool Listing: 15 May 2023 10AM UTCFor more information: • Website: https://www.scoobydoos.org/ • Telegram: https://t.me/scoobydoosodo • Twitter: https://twitter.com/scoobydoo_eth • Discord: https://discord.gg/jxb6QN3ZPR

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: What will you do if your target of 160 ETH is not reached on schedule?You use the name Scooby doo in your project. Will this not be a problem in the future? Because it looks like Scoby doo already has its own branding.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on May 10, 2023, 07:33:50 PMWhat will you do if your target of 160 ETH is not reached on schedule?You use the name Scooby doo in your project. Will this not be a problem in the future? Because it looks like Scoby doo already has its own branding.How can we address situations where there is an announcement thread for a new token, but the members are inactive and unable to respond to questions? This issue needs to be resolved. Additionally, I am curious about the number of meme coins in the market that claim to have multiple use cases, similar to what was listed by the OP

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: I saw an announcement that your token will soon be traded on the Bitmart exchange. so it looks like Whatever happens to your token sale, your token will still be traded on exchanges.
